sec.p: We used standard compounds for GC analyses and biological testing from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA) (1,8-cineole, bornyl acetate, α-terpinene, β-pinene, α-pinene, γ-terpinene, ρ-cymene, camphene, camphor, caryophyllene oxide, limonene, terpinene-4-ol, terpinolene), Fluka (Fluka Chemie GmbH, Buchs, Switzerland) (α-humulene), and Takasago (Takasago International Corporation, Tokyo, Japan) (β-caryophyllene).
